original_title: Ex-Sabaragamuwa Minister remanded over Rs. 70 m fraud
original_body_lines: Former Sabaragamuwa Provincial Council Minister Athula Kumara Rahubadda has been remanded until 2 October for allegedly misappropriating Rs. 70 million worth of State funds.

The Criminal Investigation Department (CID) arrested and produced him before the Embilipitiya Magistrate’s Court on Wednesday, which ordered that he be held in remand custody pending further investigations.
